message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features and benefits, we believe it is worth $1500000. We understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person. Our product offers unparalleled capabilities and solutions that could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. We are confident it will exceed your expectations. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on the product, I believe a price of $1500000 is slightly above what I'm currently willing to pay.  I'm prepared to offer $1200000 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value I see in the product while still being a fair amount for both of us. Would you be open to discussing this offer?
